#include<iostream>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<math.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    
    while(t--)
    {
       int n,x=0,y=0;
       int s[2];
       s[0]=0;
       s[1]=0;
       int c[2];
       c[0]=0;
       c[1]=0;
       
       scanf("%d",&n);
       
       char ar[n+5];
       scanf("%s",ar);
       
       for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
       {
        if(ar[i]=='S')
        x++;
        else
        y++;
       
       if(x==1)
       s[0]=15;
       if(x==2)
       s[0]=30;
       if(x==3)
       s[0]=40;
       if(x==4)
       {s[0]=0;c[0]=0;
       x=0;y=0;
       s[1]++;}
       
       if(y==1)
       c[0]=15;
       if(y==2)
       c[0]=30;
       if(y==3)
       c[0]=40;
       if(y==4)
       {c[0]=0;s[0]=0;
       x=0;y=0;
       c[1]++;}
       
       /*cout<<s[0]<<"\n";
       cout<<c[0]<<"\n";
       cout<<s[1]<<"\n";
       cout<<c[1]<<"\n";
       */
       
       }
       
       printf("%d",s[1]);printf("-");printf("%d",c[1]);
       
       //cout<<"\n"<<"c"<<c[0]<<" "<<"s"<<s[0];
       
       if((s[0]!=0)||(c[0]!=0))
       {printf(",");printf("%d",s[0]);printf("-");printf("%d",c[0]);}
      
       printf("\n"); 
      
      }
   // getch();
}
